#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <math.h>

// Helper functions for second program
int isLatinLetter(char c) {
    return (c >= 'a' && c <= 'z');
}

int isPunctuation(char c) {
    return c == '.' || c == ',' || c == '!' || c == '?';
}

char* process_second(const char *input) {
    int len = strlen(input);
    if (len == 0) return strdup("");

    char *result = (char *)malloc((len * 2 + 1) * sizeof(char));
    int result_len = 0;

    // Append first character
    result[result_len++] = input[0];

    for (int i = 1; i < len; i++) {
        char c = input[i];
        char prev_char = input[i-1];

        if (isLatinLetter(c)) {
            if (!isLatinLetter(prev_char) && !isPunctuation(prev_char)) {
                result[result_len++] = ' ';
            }
            result[result_len++] = c;
        } else if (isPunctuation(c)) {
            result[result_len++] = c;
        }
    }
    result[result_len] = '\0';
    return result;
}

int main() {
    int n;
    if (scanf("%d", &n) != 1) {
        printf("Error reading n\n");
        return 1;
    }

    int *arr = (int *)malloc(n * sizeof(int));
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        if (scanf("%d", &arr[i]) != 1) {
            printf("Error reading input\n");
            free(arr);
            return 1;
        }
    }

    int ans;
    int has_one = 0;

    if (n == 1) {
        ans = arr[0];
    } else {
        // Sort the array
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            for (int j = i+1; j < n; j++) {
                if (arr[i] > arr[j]) {
                    int temp = arr[i];
                    arr[i] = arr[j];
                    arr[j] = temp;
                }
            }
        }

        int current_size = n;
        while (current_size > 1 && !has_one) {
            // Step 1: Remove zeros and find min
            int *new_arr = (int *)malloc(current_size * sizeof(int));
            int new_size = 0;
            int min = 0;
            for (int i = 0; i < current_size; i++) {
                if (arr[i] != 0) {
                    new_arr[new_size++] = arr[i];
                }
            }

            if (new_size == 0) {
                ans = 0;
                has_one = 1;
                break;
            }

            min = new_arr[0];

            // Process elements after first
            for (int i = 1; i < new_size; i++) {
                int val = new_arr[i] % min;
                new_arr[i] = val;
                if (val == 1) {
                    ans = 1;
                    has_one = 1;
                    free(new_arr);
                    free(arr);
                    goto end;
                }
            }

            // Sort new array
            for (int i = 0; i < new_size; i++) {
                for (int j = i+1; j < new_size; j++) {
                    if (new_arr[i] > new_arr[j]) {
                        int temp = new_arr[i];
                        new_arr[i] = new_arr[j];
                        new_arr[j] = temp;
                    }
                }
            }

            // Update array and size
            free(arr);
            arr = new_arr;
            current_size = new_size;
        }

        if (!has_one) {
            ans = arr[0];
        }
    }

end:
    // Convert ans to string for second program
    char first_output[20];
    sprintf(first_output, "%d", ans);

    // Process second program
    char *second_result = process_second(first_output);

    // Process third program
    double input;
    char *endptr;
    input = strtod(second_result, &endptr);
    if (endptr == second_result || *endptr != '\0') {
        printf("Error parsing input: %s\n", second_result);
        free(second_result);
        free(arr);
        return 1;
    }

    if (input == 0.0) {
        printf("Error: division by zero\n");
        free(second_result);
        free(arr);
        return 1;
    }

    double countOdd = round(input / 2);
    double result = countOdd / input;

    // Output with 10 decimal places
    printf("%.10f\n", result);

    free(second_result);
    free(arr);
    return 0;
}
